name: Senior Network Engineer

Tencent Overseas IT has the mission to empower Tencent’s rapid global growth with future ready, global IT platforms, applications and services. We are chartered to lead the Overseas IT strategy, architecture, roadmap and execution. Satisfying our internal/external customers and becoming a world class global IT team are our top aspirations.
 
We are currently seeking a passionate Sr Network Engineer to create a world class collaboration experience for everyone at Tencent Overseas. Reporting to the Director of Employee Experience, you’ll be responsible for designing, building and supporting a highly available workspace infrastructure that lets employees communicate and collaborate reliably and smoothly regardless of where or what time zones they’re in.
 
You will be engineering network solutions to enable our Tencent workforce and game studios. You have a track record building and expanding offices. Working closely with our Sr Infrastructure Architect and engineers, partners and stakeholders, you will play a critical role to design, implement and support enterprise infrastructure and workspace capabilities to enable a simple, sleek, cohesive employee experience.

•	Create and maintain dashboard to report system health and relevant product metrics

•	Train and provide knowledge transfer for junior colleagues
